alcoholic1.name: Alcoholic
alcoholic1.desc: Starts dependent on alcohol. Suffers withdrawal without it, but gets a bonus when drinking.

buzzed.name: Buzzed
buzzed.desc: Slightly intoxicated. Willpower is up, but Perception is slightly lowered.

hangover.name: Hangover
hangover.desc: The morning after. Willpower and Dexterity are temporarily reduced.

medic1.name: Field Medic
medic1.desc: Basic medical training. Provides a significant starting bonus to the Medicine skill.

hunter1.name: Hunter
hunter1.desc: Skilled in tracking and stalking prey. Provides bonuses to Survival and Ranged skills.

artificer1.name: Artificer
artificer1.desc: A tinkerer and inventor. Provides bonuses to Crafting and Science skills.

strategicMap.selectSector: Select a sector on the map to see details.

scavenger_base.name: Scavenger Base
scavenger_base.desc: A well-established outpost for a group of scavengers.

scavenger_camp.name: Scavenger Camp
scavenger_camp.desc: A small camp. They might not be here for long, aren't they?

scavenger_group.name: Scavenger Group
scavenger_group.desc: A group of scavengers. Did they find something valuable?

scavenger_patrol.name: Scavenger Patrol
scavenger_patrol.desc: A small, mobile group of scavengers.

abandoned_car.name: Abandoned Car
abandoned_car.desc: A rusted-out husk of a vehicle. Might be something inside.

crashed_drone.name: Crashed Drone
crashed_drone.desc: A military-grade drone, half-buried in the dirt. Its cargo might still be intact.

makeshift_cache.name: Makeshift Cache
makeshift_cache.desc: A cleverly hidden stash of supplies.

fists.name: Fists
fists.desc: Your bare hands. Better than nothing, but not by much.

makeshiftKnife.name: Makeshift Knife
makeshiftKnife.desc: A crude blade sharpened from scrap metal. Rusty, but sharp enough to cut.

spear.name: Scrap Spear
spear.desc: A long metal pipe with a sharpened tip. Excellent for keeping mutants at a distance.

fireAxe.name: Fire Axe
fireAxe.desc: An old world tool with a heavy head. Delivers devastating chopping blows.

beretta92.name: Beretta 92
beretta92.desc: A well-preserved semi-automatic pistol. Reliable, accurate, and deadly in the right hands.

pumpShotgun.name: Pump Shotgun
pumpShotgun.desc: Reliable close-quarters firepower. The sound of racking the slide alone can end fights.

makeshiftRifle.name: Pipe Rifle
makeshiftRifle.desc: A single-shot rifle cobbled together from pipes and wood. Inaccurate, but hits hard at range.

crossbow.name: Hunter's Crossbow
crossbow.desc: Silent and deadly. Perfect for ambushes, and you can recover the bolts if you're lucky.

regularCloth.name: Regular Clothes
regularCloth.desc: Simple, worn clothing. Offers minimal protection against the elements.

travelDuster.name: Travel Duster
travelDuster.desc: A heavy leather coat treated to resist rain and dust. Offers basic protection.

lightLeatherArmor.name: Light Leather Armor
lightLeatherArmor.desc: Patches of cured leather stitched together. Lightweight mobility with decent protection.

reinforcedLeatherArmor.name: Reinforced Leather
reinforcedLeatherArmor.desc: Leather armor reinforced with scrap metal plates. Heavy, but can stop a knife or a claw.

scrap.name: Scrap
scrap.desc: Assorted junk and metal parts. The currency of survival.

money.name: Credits
money.desc: Old World electronic credits. Still accepted by traders.

ration.name: Ration Pack
ration.desc: Preserved food. Doesn't taste like much, but keeps you alive.
